description.long: Amin Al Hazwani worked as a graphic designer, web designer, event organizer, front-end developer, mobile interface designer, design system designer, product designer, and today is a design ops director. He designed a wide range of things, from icons to design systems. He organized design events and designed design orgs. He worked alone, in a duo, in a small team, in a medium-sized design agency, in a big distributed company. He literally tried it all.
